## Theoretical exercises

### Exercise T.1

```{r}
set.seed(123)
x <- seq(from = 0, to = 4, length = 100)
y <- 2 + x + rnorm(100, 0, 1)
x_center <- x - mean(x)
y_center <- y - mean(y)
```

```{r}
mean(y)
```


- To fix the ideas, the OLS estimed with [uncentered predictors]{.blue} is

```{r}
#| echo: true
coef(lm(y ~ x))
```

- After centering, we obtain the 


```{r}
#| echo: true
round(coef(lm(y_center ~ x_center)), 6)
```

- asd

```{r}
#| echo: true
coef(lm(y ~ x_center))
```

```{r}
#| echo: true
coef(lm(y ~ 0 + x_center))
```
